author: cnbc.com
title: Arcadia Biosciences reports 4Q loss
text:
DAVIS, Calif. (AP) _ Arcadia Biosciences Inc. (RKDA) on Tuesday reported a loss of $3 million in its fourth quarter.
On a per-share basis, the Davis, California-based company said it had a loss of $1.39.
The agricultural biotechnology trait company posted revenue of $1.4 million in the period.
For the year, the company reported that its loss narrowed to $15.7 million, or $7.28 per share. Revenue was reported as $4 million.
Arcadia Biosciences shares have climbed sevenfold since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $38.61, more than doubling in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on RKDA at https://www.zacks.com/ap/RKDA
